subject: Issuance of duplicate tickets and tampering with server at toll plazas
text: HRdfr <cfl4u <TTHT giferaut TM _ Phane : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (ma 4aat, 430 4a87 3r TTANf #7Ir) #4 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India VM. Extn:: 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) #-5 W 6, Adr7-10, ERrGT, 7f faci-110 075 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka_ New Delhi-110075 Ref:NHAL/13013/382/10-11/CMD-CO/Discreet Assignments 5# April, 2010 CIRCULAR No_NHALLCommercial Operations 118 Sub: Issuance Of duplicate tickets and tampering with server at toll plazas: It has been found in various discreet assignments conducted at Head Office level that fee collecting agencies are using duplicate tickets at various toll plazas. Cases have come to our notice regarding tampering with server and use of software facilitating deletion of vehicle crossing entries, conversion of heavy vehicles into cars etc; and thereby misappropriating the   public money. This is very serious  offence and not possible without mutual   involvement of fee   collecting agency, server   maintaining agency and agency providing round the clock supervisors. Under the circumstances stated above, all Regional Heads are requested to have a strict monitoring a5 per circular no.111 dated 20.11.2009 to check the above issues and instruct Project Directors to be more vigilant in general and specifically with respect to manipulation in server data: lapse on the part of Project Directors be viewed seriously_ Wherever issuance of duplicate tickets and tampering with server are found, criminal cases may be registered against concerned agencies engaged at toll plazas. This is issued for strict compliance. V_ h-lo ((J K Pandey Chief General Manager(Commercial Operations) All Regional Officers, NHAI to: All PIUs/CMUs to: Member(A)Member(F)Member(T)SIP/Member(T)BNS/Member(T)VLP PS to Chairman/all CGMs/cVO/all GMs/Librarian/ Director(Self Employment) , DGR, Ministry of Defence, RK Puram, New Delhi/ HF 7 UM NHAL Any To, Copy Copy
